translations: v．挤压，榨取：用力压榨，使液体或气体从中流出。
· She squeezes the orange to make juice.
n．紧缩，压力：经济、政治或社会方面的压力或紧张局势。

phrs.translation: n. 处境困难；极度拥挤；狭道

sentences.sentence: Though he is often busy, he squeezes time to go to a gym.
sentences.translation: 虽然他经常很忙，他依然会挤出时间去健身房锻炼。

sentences.sentence: My father squeezes my hand and smiles at me.
sentences.translation: 父亲紧握着我的手，向我微笑着。

sentences.sentence: It mercilessly squeezes the suppliers of its own-brand products.
sentences.translation: 它不遗余力地要求供应商做自己的品牌的产品。
